scripts.push: cross-env DATABASE_HOST='localhost' npx prisma db push
scripts.migration: cross-env DATABASE_HOST='localhost' npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.migration:reset: cross-env DATABASE_HOST='localhost' npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.test:ci: cross-env DATABASE_URL='postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/postgres' npx prisma db push && cross-env JWT_REFRESH_SECRET=CITi JWT_ACCESS_SECRET=CITi DATABASE_URL='postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/postgres' jest --runInBand --ci
scripts.test: cross-env DATABASE_URL='postgres://postgres:docker@localhost:5433/boilerplate-test' npx prisma db push && cross-env DATABASE_URL='postgres://postgres:docker@localhost:5433/boilerplate-test' jest --runInBand
